Santa_Fe.Meow Wolf:
Meow Wolf is an Arts and Entertainment company based in Santa Fe, New Mexico, United States. The organization was founded in 2008.


== History ==
Meow Wolf was formed in February as an Artist Collective in 2008 by "a group of young residents hoping to supply Santa Fe with an alternative arts and music venue." They originally leased commercial spaces to hold gallery shows and underground music events, but switched to a decentralized model in 2010.
